changes: Feigning death shows gibs, sniper shots, backstabs, etc, as expected.
Corpses from a feign death use correct wearable behavior
Weapons dropped from a feign death have proper collision.
Fixed a couple of physics issues on ragdolls created by feign death.

positive: [Hidden] On activation, gain 90% damage reduction for 6.5 seconds
negative: +60% cloak drain rate

positive: [Hidden] On activation, gain 90% damage reduction for 6.5 seconds

positive: [Hidden] On activation, gain 90% damage reduction for 6.5 seconds
negative: +60% cloak drain rate

changes: The Dead Ringer's Cloak meter can now be regenerated from ammo sources.
The Dead Ringer's Cloak consume rate has been slightly reduced.
The Dead Ringer's "extra" Cloak powers (damage reduction and no-flicker) are not extended by obtaining ammo.
Being attacked while taunting with the Dead Ringer out no longer triggers a Spy's Cloak, but instead keeps the damage reduction for the remaining duration of the taunt.
Emerging from this item's Cloak now drains up to 40% of the Cloak meter instead of 100%.
